<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1923]]''' – [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] receives an increase in salary from £600 p.a. to £700 p.a.

* '''[[1964]]''' – The second episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[2009]]''' – Mereth Aderthad XV, or "EstelCon", in [[wikipedia:Cardona, Spain
